content:
@Ted, according to your comments on task GF#9239, the codes haev been added to the v2 table. But when I look in the v2 table 0203 for SNO Serial Number
SB Social Beneficiary Identifier
UDI Universal Device Identifier
PLAC Placer Identifier
FILL Filler Identifier, I don't see them?
sorry- that should have @Ted Klein

I am looking at the November 2017 harmonization release of the v2 content, and the v2.9 chapter 2C supplied to Publishing for the January ballot - note that the v2 ballot was delayed, and there was no V2 overall 2.9 ballot in the January cycle, so the new material did not get in. So what you are looking at is old, and not the newest stuff. The v2 chapter 2C from the last harmonization, released on December 6, 2017, is on the harmonization events page and can be downloaded from there. The v2 database content was also updated, but I suspect you do not havre the latest version of that either. So...the codes are in there, but you do not have the latest version of the material (since we do not yet have a Unified source for HL7 terminology :-)
ok, can you send me the latest?
I'm searching for the updated db, Frank may not have sent it to me after he updated it.
the latest version I have is db93. I will contact Frank and get the updated one and shoot it to you
ok he is prolly in bed now, I should get it tomorrow (my time) morning. I'll ping you on Skype once I've got it in hnnd
Frank has not responded, no idea why. I'll try to raise him over the weekend and on Monday.
